text: White Shadow is a 2013 drama movie. It was written, made, and directed by Noaz Deshe. The people working on the movie were in Germany, Italy and Tanzania. The movie was first shown during Criticsâ€™ Week at the 70th Venice International Film Festival on September 2, 2013. It won a prize called the Lion of the Future Award at that festival. It is about an albino. ==Other websites== * Official website * Official website * * Category:2013 drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Italian drama movies
title: White Shadow (movie)
